description: This source file defines the WellnessController class, which manages wellness-related API endpoints such as listing resources, tracking activities, and listing tracked activities. It interacts with an external wellnessService module to perform data operations and formats HTTP responses accordingly.

classes.name: WellnessController
classes.description: Controller class providing wellness-related API endpoints, including listing resources, tracking activities, and listing tracked activities.

methods.name: listResources(req, res)
methods.description: Handles the request to list wellness resources by calling the wellnessService and returning the JSON response.

methods.name: trackActivity(req, res)
methods.description: Processes activity tracking requests, validates input, delegates to wellnessService, and returns the recorded activity.

methods.name: listTracked(req, res)
methods.description: Lists tracked wellness activities with pagination parameters, delegating to wellnessService and returning results.
